title: what will happen to the first strike icons i haven't completed after Today?
body:
I have the first strike icon for ekko but i don't have the project cores and am not planning to get them any time today 

what will happen to the ekko project icon ?

will it disappear ?

will you take it away riot ?

replies.body: You may still be able to get the icon, but the first strike border won't be available once the event is over.  More details are also available on our [project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide.  If you want the border, today is it!

But how can I craft them if I can no longer get the cores? Also, according to the FAQ in the guide, I should be able to disenchant all the project related crafting items (cores, blueprints, augment cache fragments, etc...) but the only option appearing when I click the items is the option to craft them, no disenchant option is available. Will there be an alternate method for crafting the summoner icons now that the even is over, or is my only option to disenchant them now that I can't get the cores?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KdOQM4Hf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-16T21:35:38.265+0000)
>
> You may still be able to get the icon, but the first strike border won't be available once the event is over.  More details are also available on our [project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide.  If you want the border, today is it!

oooh so i can form the icon later on and not have it on the loading screen on project ekko??

ookay thats nice
